channel.title: All Posts - moeve's CTF Writeups | Cybersecurity Blog
channel.description: All Posts | moeve's CTF Writeups | Cybersecurity Blog

item.title: Neurogrid CTF: Human-Only 2025 | AI
item.description: Neurogrid CTF: Human-Only 2025 was a 4-day CTF hosted by HackTheBox. I competed solo as “Legendary Queue” and finished in the top 4 out of 1337 players. This post covers the AI challenges.

item.title: Hack The Boo CTF 2025 | Crypto
item.description: Hack The Boo CTF 2025 was a 2-day CTF hosted by HackTheBox. I competed solo as “Legendary Queue” and finished in the top 5 out of 2892 players. This post covers the Crypto challenges.
